name: Horus
temple_description:
In ancient Egyptian mythology, Horus is the guardian angel of pharaohs, 
a symbol of royal authority. 
She is also the goddess of revenge, presiding over law and order. 
She defeated Set, the cruel ruler of Egypt, and avenged her father. 
She then became the new ruling god of Egypt. 
It is said she loved her people more than herself.

active_skills.name: Judgment Claw (Divine Judgment)
active_skills.effect:
Deals 200% P.DMG to all enemies, decreasing their DMG Increase by 30%. 
At the same time, bestows [Judgment] to all allies (Both effects last for 2 rounds). 

[Judgment]: When defeated, the enemy who defeated the bearer becomes the target. 
Reduces the target's ATK by 15% of Horus's Max ATK until the end of the battle 
(Ignores Debuff RES; cannot be dispelled). This state can stack, up to 3 layers.

active_skills.name: Punishment Eye (Divinity Eye)
active_skills.effect: Deals 500% P.DMG to one enemy and dispels 1 buff.

exclusive_ur+_skill.name: Avenging Angel
exclusive_ur+_skill.effect:
When entering battle, bestows [Vengeance] to all allies (cannot be dispelled). 
When [Vengeance] is triggered, increases all allies' ATK and DEF by 40% 
of Horus's current ATK and DEF for 4 rounds (each angel can only trigger 
this effect once; cannot be dispelled; cannot stack). 

[Vengeance]: When receiving fatal damage, the bearer continues to act in 
the state of a soul (doesn't count as killed), remaining at 1 HP 
(cannot be healed afterward). 
At the same time, she receives a shield equal to 1000% of Horus's Max ATK 
(cannot be dispelled; the shield cannot exceed twice the Max HP of Horus).
